Attributes.Name: instance_ids
Attributes.Description: ID list of CVM instances to be attached to the scaling group.

Attributes.Name: scaling_group_id
Attributes.Description: ID of a scaling group.

Items.Description: Provides a resource to attach or detach CVM instances to a specified scaling group.

Attributes.Name: notification_metadata
Attributes.Description: Contains additional information that you want to include any time AS sends a message to the notification target.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 生命周期挂钩通知元数据

Attributes.Name: notification_target_type
Attributes.Description: Target type. Valid values: `CMQ_QUEUE`, `CMQ_TOPIC`.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 生命周期挂钩通知目标类型

Attributes.Name: lifecycle_hook_name
Attributes.Description: The name of the lifecycle hook.

Attributes.Name: heartbeat_timeout
Attributes.Description: Defines the amount of time, in seconds, that can elapse before the lifecycle hook times out. Valid value ranges: (30~7200). and default value is `300`.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 生命周期挂钩超时时间

Attributes.Name: notification_queue_name
Attributes.Description: For CMQ_QUEUE type, a name of queue must be set.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 生命周期挂钩通知目标队列名称

Attributes.Name: notification_topic_name
Attributes.Description: For CMQ_TOPIC type, a name of topic must be set.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 生命周期挂钩通知目标主题名称

Attributes.Name: scaling_group_id
Attributes.Description: ID of a scaling group.

Attributes.Name: lifecycle_transition
Attributes.Description: The instance state to which you want to attach the lifecycle hook. Valid values: `INSTANCE_LAUNCHING` and `INSTANCE_TERMINATING`.

Attributes.Name: default_result
Attributes.Description: Defines the action the AS group should take when the lifecycle hook timeout elapses or if an unexpected failure occurs. Valid values: `CONTINUE` and `ABANDON`. The default value is `CONTINUE`.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 生命周期挂钩默认结果

Items.Description: Provides a resource for an AS (Auto scaling) lifecycle hook.
Items.TerraformTypeCN: 自动伸缩组生命周期挂钩
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_as_lifecycle_hook" "lifecycle_hook" {
  scaling_group_id         = "sg-12af45"
  lifecycle_hook_name      = "tf-as-lifecycle-hook"
  lifecycle_transition     = "INSTANCE_LAUNCHING"
  default_result           = "CONTINUE"
  heartbeat_timeout        = 500
  notification_metadata    = "tf test"
  notification_target_type = "CMQ_QUEUE"
  notification_queue_name  = "lifcyclehook"
}
```

Attributes.Name: scaling_group_id
Attributes.Description: ID of a scaling group.

Attributes.Name: notification_types
Attributes.Description: A list of Notification Types that trigger notifications. Acceptable values are `SCALE_OUT_FAILED`, `SCALE_IN_SUCCESSFUL`, `SCALE_IN_FAILED`, `REPLACE_UNHEALTHY_INSTANCE_SUCCESSFUL` and `REPLACE_UNHEALTHY_INSTANCE_FAILED`.

Attributes.Name: notification_user_group_ids
Attributes.Description: A group of user IDs to be notified.

Items.Description: Provides a resource for an AS (Auto scaling) notification.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_as_notification" "as_notification" {
  scaling_group_id            = "sg-12af45"
  notification_types          = ["SCALE_OUT_FAILED", "SCALE_IN_SUCCESSFUL", "SCALE_IN_FAILED", "REPLACE_UNHEALTHY_INSTANCE_FAILED"]
  notification_user_group_ids = ["76955"]
}
```

Attributes.Name: instance_types
Attributes.Description: Specified types of CVM instances.

Attributes.Name: spot_max_price
Attributes.Description: Max price of a spot instance, is the format of decimal string, for example "0.50". Note: it only works when instance_charge_type is set to `SPOTPAID`.

Attributes.Name: public_ip_assigned
Attributes.Description: Specify whether to assign an Internet IP address.

Attributes.Name: keep_image_login
Attributes.Description: Specify whether to keep original settings of a CVM image. And it can't be used with password or key_ids together.

Attributes.Name: configuration_name
Attributes.Description: Name of a launch configuration.

Attributes.Name: system_disk_type
Attributes.Description: Type of a CVM disk. Valid values: `CLOUD_PREMIUM` and `CLOUD_SSD`. Default is `CLOUD_PREMIUM`. valid when disk_type_policy is ORIGINAL.

Attributes.Name: instance_charge_type_prepaid_renew_flag
Attributes.Description: Auto renewal flag. Valid values: `NOTIFY_AND_AUTO_RENEW`: notify upon expiration and renew automatically, `NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW`: notify upon expiration but do not renew automatically, `DISABLE_NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW`: neither notify upon expiration nor renew automatically. Default value: `NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW`. If this parameter is specified as `NOTIFY_AND_AUTO_RENEW`, the instance will be automatically renewed on a monthly basis if the account balance is sufficient. NOTE: it only works when instance_charge_type is set to `PREPAID`.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 实例计费类型预付费自动续费标识

Attributes.Name: internet_charge_type
Attributes.Description: Charge types for network traffic. Valid values: `BANDWIDTH_PREPAID`, `TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR`, `TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR` and `BANDWIDTH_PACKAGE`.

Attributes.Name: internet_max_bandwidth_out
Attributes.Description: Max bandwidth of Internet access in Mbps. Default is `0`.

Attributes.Name: security_group_ids
Attributes.Description: Security groups to which a CVM instance belongs.

Attributes.Name: user_data
Attributes.Description: Ase64-encoded User Data text, the length limit is 16KB.

Attributes.Name: instance_charge_type
Attributes.Description: Charge type of instance. Valid values are `PREPAID`, `POSTPAID_BY_HOUR`, `SPOTPAID`. The default is `POSTPAID_BY_HOUR`. NOTE: `SPOTPAID` instance must set `spot_instance_type` and `spot_max_price` at the same time.

BlockTypes.Name: instance_name_settings

PossibleValues.Name: instance_name_style
PossibleValues.Description: Type of CVM instance name. Valid values: `ORIGINAL` and `UNIQUE`. Default is `ORIGINAL`.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: CVM实例名称的类型。有效值“ORIGINAL”和“UNIQUE”。默认值为“ORIGINAL”

BlockTypes.Name: data_disk
BlockTypes.Description: Configurations of data disk.

PossibleValues.Name: delete_with_instance
PossibleValues.Description: Indicates whether the disk remove after instance terminated. Default is `false`.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 指示实例终止后是否删除磁盘。默认值为“false”

PossibleValues.Name: disk_type
PossibleValues.Description: Types of disk. Valid values: `CLOUD_PREMIUM` and `CLOUD_SSD`. valid when disk_type_policy is ORIGINAL.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 磁盘类型。有效值“CLOUD_PREMIUM”和“CLOUD_SSD”。当disk_type_policy为ORIGINAL时有效

PossibleValues.Name: disk_size
PossibleValues.Description: Volume of disk in GB. Default is `0`.

PossibleValues.Name: snapshot_id
PossibleValues.Description: Data disk snapshot ID.

ExportAttributes.Name: status
ExportAttributes.Description: Current statues of a launch configuration.

ExportAttributes.Name: instance_charge_type_prepaid_renew_flag
ExportAttributes.Description: Auto renewal flag. Valid values: `NOTIFY_AND_AUTO_RENEW`: notify upon expiration and renew automatically, `NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW`: notify upon expiration but do not renew automatically, `DISABLE_NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW`: neither notify upon expiration nor renew automatically. Default value: `NOTIFY_AND_MANUAL_RENEW`. If this parameter is specified as `NOTIFY_AND_AUTO_RENEW`, the instance will be automatically renewed on a monthly basis if the account balance is sufficient. NOTE: it only works when instance_charge_type is set to `PREPAID`.
ExportAttributes.DescriptionCN: 实例计费类型预付费自动续费标识

ExportAttributes.Name: create_time
ExportAttributes.Description: The time when the launch configuration was created.

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a configuration for an AS (Auto scaling) instance.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_as_scaling_config" "launch_configuration" {
  configuration_name = "launch-configuration"
  image_id           = "img-9qabwvbn"
  instance_types     = ["SA1.SMALL1"]
  project_id         = 0
  system_disk_type   = "CLOUD_PREMIUM"
  system_disk_size   = "50"

  data_disk {
    disk_type = "CLOUD_PREMIUM"
    disk_size = 50
  }

  internet_charge_type       = "TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR"
  internet_max_bandwidth_out = 10
  public_ip_assigned         = true
  password                   = "test123#"
  enhanced_security_service  = false
  enhanced_monitor_service   = false
  user_data                  = "dGVzdA=="

  instance_tags = {
    tag = "as"
  }
}
```

### Using SPOT charge type

```hcl
resource "cloud_as_scaling_config" "launch_configuration" {
  configuration_name   = "launch-configuration"
  image_id             = "img-9qabwvbn"
  instance_types       = ["SA1.SMALL1"]
  instance_charge_type = "SPOTPAID"
  spot_instance_type   = "one-time"
  spot_max_price       = "1000"
}
```

Attributes.Name: configuration_id
Attributes.Description: An available ID for a launch configuration.

Attributes.Name: max_size
Attributes.Description: Maximum number of CVM instances. Valid value ranges: (0~2000).

Attributes.Name: vpc_id
Attributes.Description: ID of VPC network.

Attributes.Name: desired_capacity
Attributes.Description: Desired volume of CVM instances, which is between `max_size` and `min_size`.

Attributes.Name: termination_policies
Attributes.Description: Available values for termination policies. Valid values: OLDEST_INSTANCE and NEWEST_INSTANCE.

Attributes.Name: replace_load_balancer_unhealthy
Attributes.Description: Enable unhealthy instance replacement. If set to `true`, AS will replace instances that are found unhealthy in the CLB health check.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 替换负载均衡不健康实例

Attributes.Name: tags
Attributes.Description: Tags of a scaling group.

Attributes.Name: scaling_group_name
Attributes.Description: Name of a scaling group.

Attributes.Name: subnet_ids
Attributes.Description: ID list of subnet, for VPC it is required.

Attributes.Name: load_balancer_ids
Attributes.Description: ID list of traditional load balancers.

Attributes.Name: retry_policy
Attributes.Description: Available values for retry policies. Valid values: IMMEDIATE_RETRY and INCREMENTAL_INTERVALS.

Attributes.Name: multi_zone_subnet_policy
Attributes.Description: Multi zone or subnet strategy, Valid values: PRIORITY and EQUALITY.

Attributes.Name: project_id
Attributes.Description: Specifies to which project the scaling group belongs.

Attributes.Name: zones
Attributes.Description: List of available zones, for Basic network it is required.

Attributes.Name: scaling_mode
Attributes.Description: Indicates scaling mode which creates and terminates instances (classic method), or method first tries to start stopped instances (wake up stopped) to perform scaling operations. Available values: `CLASSIC_SCALING`, `WAKE_UP_STOPPED_SCALING`. Default: `CLASSIC_SCALING`.

Attributes.Name: min_size
Attributes.Description: Minimum number of CVM instances. Valid value ranges: (0~2000).

Attributes.Name: default_cooldown
Attributes.Description: Default cooldown time in second, and default value is `300`.

Attributes.Name: replace_monitor_unhealthy
Attributes.Description: Enables unhealthy instance replacement. If set to `true`, AS will replace instances that are flagged as unhealthy by Cloud Monitor.

BlockTypes.Name: forward_balancer_ids
BlockTypes.Description: List of application load balancers, which can't be specified with `load_balancer_ids` together.

PossibleValues.Name: rule_id
PossibleValues.Description: ID of forwarding rules.

PossibleValues.Name: target_attribute
PossibleValues.Description: Attribute list of target rules.

PossibleValues.Name: port

PossibleValues.Name: weight
PossibleValues.Description: Weight.

PossibleValues.Name: load_balancer_id
PossibleValues.Description: ID of available load balancers.

PossibleValues.Name: listener_id

PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 应用程序负载平衡器的侦听器ID

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a group of AS (Auto scaling) instances.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_as_scaling_group" "scaling_group" {
  scaling_group_name   = "tf-as-scaling-group"
  configuration_id     = "asc-oqio4yyj"
  max_size             = 1
  min_size             = 0
  vpc_id               = "vpc-3efmz0z"
  subnet_ids           = ["subnet-mc3egos"]
  project_id           = 0
  default_cooldown     = 400
  desired_capacity     = 1
  termination_policies = ["NEWEST_INSTANCE"]
  retry_policy         = "INCREMENTAL_INTERVALS"

  forward_balancer_ids {
    load_balancer_id = "lb-hk693b1l"
    listener_id      = "lbl-81wr497k"
    rule_id          = "loc-kiodx943"

    target_attribute {
      port   = 80
      weight = 90
    }
  }
}
```

Attributes.Name: continuous_time
Attributes.Description: Retry times. Valid value ranges: (1~10).

Attributes.Name: statistic
Attributes.Description: Statistic types. Valid values: `AVERAGE`, `MAXIMUM` and `MINIMUM`. Default is `AVERAGE`.

Attributes.Name: cooldown
Attributes.Description: Cooldwon time in second. Default is `30`0.

Attributes.Name: notification_user_group_ids
Attributes.Description: An ID group of users to be notified when an alarm is triggered.

Attributes.Name: policy_name
Attributes.Description: Name of a policy used to define a reaction when an alarm is triggered.

Attributes.Name: adjustment_value
Attributes.Description: Define the number of instances by which to scale.For `CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY` type or PERCENT_CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY, a positive increment adds to the current capacity and a negative value removes from the current capacity. For `EXACT_CAPACITY` type, it defines an absolute number of the existing Auto Scaling group size.

Attributes.Name: comparison_operator
Attributes.Description: Comparison operator. Valid values: `GREATER_THAN`, `GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO`, `LESS_THAN`, `LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO`, `EQUAL_TO` and `NOT_EQUAL_TO`.

Attributes.Name: metric_name
Attributes.Description: Name of an indicator. Valid values: `CPU_UTILIZATION`, `MEM_UTILIZATION`, `LAN_TRAFFIC_OUT`, `LAN_TRAFFIC_IN`, `WAN_TRAFFIC_OUT` and `WAN_TRAFFIC_IN`.

Attributes.Name: threshold
Attributes.Description: Alarm threshold.

Attributes.Name: scaling_group_id
Attributes.Description: ID of a scaling group.

Attributes.Name: adjustment_type
Attributes.Description: Specifies whether the adjustment is an absolute number or a percentage of the current capacity. Valid values: `CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY`, `EXACT_CAPACITY` and `PERCENT_CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY`.

Attributes.Name: period
Attributes.Description: Time period in second. Valid values: `60` and `300`.

Items.Description: Provides a resource for an AS (Auto scaling) policy.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_as_scaling_policy" "scaling_policy" {
  scaling_group_id    = "asg-n32ymck2"
  policy_name         = "tf-as-scaling-policy"
  adjustment_type     = "EXACT_CAPACITY"
  adjustment_value    = 0
  comparison_operator = "GREATER_THAN"
  metric_name         = "CPU_UTILIZATION"
  threshold           = 80
  period              = 300
  continuous_time     = 10
  statistic           = "AVERAGE"
  cooldown            = 360
}
```

Attributes.Name: recurrence
Attributes.Description: The time when recurring future actions will start. Start time is specified by the user following the Unix cron syntax format. And this argument should be set with end_time together.

Attributes.Name: scaling_group_id
Attributes.Description: ID of a scaling group.

Attributes.Name: schedule_action_name
Attributes.Description: The name of this scaling action.

Attributes.Name: max_size
Attributes.Description: The maximum size for the Auto Scaling group.

Attributes.Name: min_size
Attributes.Description: The minimum size for the Auto Scaling group.

Attributes.Name: desired_capacity
Attributes.Description: The desired number of CVM instances that should be running in the group.

Attributes.Name: start_time
Attributes.Description: The time for this action to start, in "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+08:00" format (UTC+8).

Attributes.Name: end_time
Attributes.Description: The time for this action to end, in "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+08:00" format (UTC+8).

Items.Description: Provides a resource for an AS (Auto scaling) schedule.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_as_schedule" "schedule" {
  scaling_group_id     = "sg-12af45"
  schedule_action_name = "tf-as-schedule"
  max_size             = 10
  min_size             = 0
  desired_capacity     = 0
  start_time           = "2019-01-01T00:00:00+08:00"
  end_time             = "2019-12-01T00:00:00+08:00"
  recurrence           = "0 0 * * *"
}
```

Attributes.Name: hostname
Attributes.Description: The hostname of the instance. The name should be a combination of 2 to 60 characters, supporting multiple periods (.). The piece between two periods is composed of letters (case insensitive), numbers, and hyphens (-). Modifying will cause the instance reset.

Attributes.Name: allocate_public_ip
Attributes.Description: Associate a public IP address with an instance in a VPC or Classic. Boolean value, Default is false.

Attributes.Name: private_ip
Attributes.Description: The private IP to be assigned to this instance, must be in the provided subnet and available.

Attributes.Name: security_service
Attributes.Description: Enhance service for security, it is disable by default.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 是否开启安全服务,默认False关闭

Attributes.Name: ipv6_address
Attributes.Description: Whether to allocate an IPv6 address. Defaults to not allocating if not specified.

Attributes.Name: availability_zone
Attributes.Description: The available zone for the bms instance.

Attributes.Name: operating_system
Attributes.Description: The operate system of bms instance.

Attributes.Name: internet_max_bandwidth_out
Attributes.Description: Maximum outgoing bandwidth to the public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bits per second). This value does not need to be set when `allocate_public_ip` is false. The max values is 1000

Attributes.Name: vpc_id
Attributes.Description: The ID of a VPC network.

Attributes.Name: whistle_service
Attributes.Description: Enhance service for whistle, it is disable by default.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 是否开启云哨/硬件监控服务，默认False关闭

Attributes.Name: tags
Attributes.Description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

Attributes.Name: flavor_id
Attributes.Description: The flavor of the instance.

Attributes.Name: instance_name
Attributes.Description: The name of the instance. The max length of instance_name is 60, and default value is `Unnamed`.

Attributes.Name: operating_system_type
Attributes.Description: The operating system type of the instance.

Attributes.Name: placement_group_id
Attributes.Description: The ID of a placement group.

Attributes.Name: subnet_id
Attributes.Description: The ID of a VPC subnet.

Attributes.Name: password
Attributes.Description: Password for the instance. The password can only be set when creating a new instance. It is not modifiable after the instance is created.

Attributes.Name: raid_type

Attributes.Name: internet_service_provider

ExportAttributes.Name: create_time

ExportAttributes.Name: instance_status

ExportAttributes.Name: internet_service_provider
ExportAttributes.Description: The Internet Service Provider (ISP) associated with the instance.

Items.Description: Provide a resource to create a bms instance.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_bms_instance" "cloud_bms_instance-wuua" {
  operating_system      = "your operating system name"
  operating_system_type = "Linux"
  password              = "your password"
  subnet_id             = "your subnet id"
  vpc_id                = "your vpc id"
  flavor_id             = "your flavorid"
  instance_name         = "your instance"
  ipv6_address          = true
  raid_type             = "NORAID"
  availability_zone     = "your zone name"
  security_service      = true
  whistle_service       = true
}
```

Attributes.Name: name
Attributes.Description: Name of the placement group, 1-60 characters in length.

Attributes.Name: type
Attributes.Description: Type of the placement group. Valid values: `RACK_SAME_SW` and `RACK`.

ExportAttributes.Name: current_num
ExportAttributes.Description: Number of hosts in the placement group.
ExportAttributes.DescriptionCN: 当前置放群组内云服务器数量

ExportAttributes.Name: create_time
ExportAttributes.Description: Creation time of the placement group.

Items.Description: Provide a resource to create a placement group.

Attributes.Name: resource_type
Attributes.Description: The resource type to be backed up. Valid values: 'CFS','COS', 'CSP', 'DISK', 'INSTANCE', 'MySQL_MariaDB', 'TDSQL_MySQL'
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 要开通备份服务的产品类型。取值范围：DISK：云硬盘,CFS：文件存储,CVM：云服务器,TDSQL_MySQL：TDSQL_MySQL版,MySQL_MariaDB：关系型数据库(MySQL_MariaDB),COS：对象存储。

Attributes.Name: brc_backup_service_is_open
Attributes.Description: Current status of the BRC backup service for this user. Valid values: true, false.

ExportAttributes.Name: brc_backup_service_is_open
ExportAttributes.Description: Current status of the BRC backup service for this user. Valid values: true, false.

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a brc activate_backup_service.

Attributes.Name: resource_type
Attributes.Description: Product type for creating scheduled policy. Valid values: DISK (Cloud Block Storage), CFS (Cloud File Storage), CVM (Cloud Virtual Machine), TDSQL_MySQL (TDSQL MySQL Edition), MySQL_MariaDB (Relational Database MySQL_MariaDB), COS (Cloud Object Storage).
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 要创建定期策略的产品类型。取值范围：DISK：云硬盘,CFS：文件存储,CVM：云服务器,TDSQL_MySQL：TDSQL_MySQL版,MySQL_MariaDB：关系型数据库(MySQL_MariaDB),COS：对象存储。

Attributes.Name: full_backup_interval
Attributes.Description: How many backups to do a full backup, 0 means all full backups.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 每隔几个备份做一个全量备份，0表示全部做全量备份。

Attributes.Name: retention_amount
Attributes.Description: Maximum number of backups retained through this scheduled backup policy. When exceeding this limit, the earliest created backup will be automatically deleted. This parameter cannot conflict with the IsPermanent parameter.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 通过该定期备份策略最多保留的备份个数，超过该个数限制后自动删除最先创建的备份，该参数不可与IsPermanent参数冲突。

Attributes.Name: need_archive
Attributes.Description: Indicates that backups created by this policy will all be used for archiving.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 标识该策略创建的备份均将用于归档。

Attributes.Name: auto_backup_policy_name
Attributes.Description: Name of the scheduled backup policy.

Attributes.Name: is_permanent
Attributes.Description: Whether backups created through this scheduled backup policy are permanently retained. false means not permanently retained, true means permanently retained, default is false.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 通过该定期备份策略创建的备份是否永久保留。false表示非永久保留，true表示永久保留，默认为false。

Attributes.Name: is_activated
Attributes.Description: Whether to activate the scheduled backup policy.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 是否激活定期备份策略。

Attributes.Name: dry_run
Attributes.Description: Whether to actually create the scheduled backup policy. true means only get the first backup start time without actually creating the scheduled backup policy, false means create, default is false.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 是否实际创建定期备份策略。true表示只需获取首次开始备份的时间，不实际创建定期备份策略，false表示创建，默认为false。

Attributes.Name: create_speed
Attributes.Description: Bandwidth limit for backup creation, range: [0, 100].
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 创建备份的带宽上限，范围:[0, 100]

BlockTypes.Name: advanced_retention_policy
BlockTypes.Description: Advanced retention policy.

PossibleValues.Name: years
PossibleValues.Description: Retention years.

PossibleValues.Name: days
PossibleValues.Description: Retention days.

PossibleValues.Name: weeks
PossibleValues.Description: Retention weeks.

PossibleValues.Name: months
PossibleValues.Description: Retention months.

BlockTypes.Name: policy
BlockTypes.Description: Execution policy for scheduled backup.

PossibleValues.Name: hour
PossibleValues.Description: Trigger time for scheduled snapshot policy. Unit: hour, value range: [0, 23]. 00:00 ~ 23:00, 24 time points available, 1 means 01:00, and so on.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 指定定期快照策略的触发时间。单位为小时，取值范围：[0, 23]。00:00 ~ 23:00 共 24 个时间点可选，1表示 01:00，依此类推。

PossibleValues.Name: interval_days
PossibleValues.Description: Backup interval in days.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 指定创建定期快照的间隔天数，默认为1，取值范围：[1, 365]，例如设置为5，则间隔5天即触发定期快照创建。注：当选择按天备份时，理论上第一次备份的时间为备份策略创建当天。如果当天备份策略创建的时间已经晚于设置的备份时间，那么将会等到第二个备份周期再进行第一次备份。

PossibleValues.Name: day_of_week
PossibleValues.Description: Selected dates from Monday to Sunday for creating snapshots, value range: [0, 6]. 0 means Sunday trigger, 1 means Monday trigger, and so on.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 选定周一到周日中需要创建快照的日期，取值范围：[0, 6]。0表示周日触发，1表示周一触发，依次类推。

PossibleValues.Name: day_of_month
PossibleValues.Description: Specify dates from the beginning to the end of each month that need to trigger scheduled backup, value range: [1, 31]. 1-31 represent specific dates of each month, for example, 5 represents the 5th of each month. Note: If dates like 29, 30, 31 that don't exist in some months are set, the corresponding months without these dates will skip scheduled backup.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 指定每月从月初到月底需要触发定期备份的日期,取值范围：[1, 31]，1-31分别表示每月的具体日期，比如5表示每月的5号。注：若设置29、30、31等部分月份不存在的日期，则对应不存在日期的月份会跳过不打定期备份。

ExportAttributes.Name: auto_backup_policy_id
ExportAttributes.Description: Auto backup policy ID.

ExportAttributes.Name: next_trigger_time
ExportAttributes.Description: First backup start time.

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create and manage BRC auto backup policy
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_brc_auto_backup_policy" "example" {
  resource_type           = "INSTANCE"
  auto_backup_policy_name = "example-policy"

  policy {
    hour          = [0, 11, 12, 13, 14]
    interval_days = 12
  }

  is_permanent         = false
  full_backup_interval = 2
  retention_amount     = 5

  advanced_retention_policy {
    days   = 1
    weeks  = 1
    months = 1
    years  = 1
  }

  is_activated = false
  dry_run      = false
}
```

Attributes.Name: access_group_id
Attributes.Description: ID of a access group.

Attributes.Name: auth_client_ip
Attributes.Description: A single IP or a single IP address range such as 203.0.113.11 or 10.10.1.0/24 indicates that all IPs are allowed. Please note that the IP entered should be CVM's private IP.

Attributes.Name: priority
Attributes.Description: The priority level of rule. Valid value ranges: (1~100). `1` indicates the highest priority.

Attributes.Name: rw_permission
Attributes.Description: Read and write permissions. Valid values are `RO` and `RW`. and default is `RO`.

Attributes.Name: user_permission
Attributes.Description: The permissions of accessing users. Valid values are `all_squash`, `no_all_squash`, `root_squash` and `no_root_squash`. and default is `root_squash`. `all_squash` indicates that all access users are mapped as anonymous users or user groups; `no_all_squash` indicates that access users will match local users first and be mapped to anonymous users or user groups after matching failed; `root_squash` indicates that map access root users to anonymous users or user groups; `no_root_squash` indicates that access root users keep root account permission.

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a CFS access rule.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_cfs_access_rule" "foo" {
  access_group_id = "pgroup-7nx89k7l"
  auth_client_ip  = "10.10.1.0/24"
  priority        = 1
  rw_permission   = "RO"
  user_permission = "root_squash"
}
```

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a cfs auto_snapshot_policy
Items.Hcl:
### use day of week

```hcl
resource "cloud_cfs_auto_snapshot_policy" "auto_snapshot_policy" {
  day_of_week = "1,2"
  hour        = "2,3"
  policy_name = "policy_name"
  alive_days  = 7
}
```

### use day of month

```hcl
resource "cloud_cfs_auto_snapshot_policy" "auto_snapshot_policy" {
  hour         = "2,3"
  policy_name  = "policy_name"
  alive_days   = 7
  day_of_month = "2,3,4"
}
```

### use interval days

```hcl
resource "cloud_cfs_auto_snapshot_policy" "auto_snapshot_policy" {
  hour          = "2,3"
  policy_name   = "policy_name"
  alive_days    = 7
  interval_days = 1
}
```

Attributes.Name: rule_action

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create and manage cloud firewall NAT access control policy
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_cfw_nat_policy" "example" {
  source_content = "1.1.1.1/0"
  source_type    = "net"
  target_content = "0.0.0.0/0"
  target_type    = "net"
  protocol       = "TCP"
  rule_action    = "drop"
  port           = "-1/-1"
  direction      = 1
  enable         = "true"
  description    = "policy description."
  scope          = "ALL"
}
```

```hcl
resource "cloud_cfw_vpc_policy" "example" {
  source_content = "0.0.0.0/0"

  dest_type      = "net"

  enable         = "true"

}
```

Attributes.Name: principal
Attributes.Description: User list. The default value is `*`, which means that any user can access. The current user can only be one included in the user list.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 用户列表，默认为User:*，表示任何user都可以访问，当前用户只能是用户列表中包含的用户

Attributes.Name: instance_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the ckafka instance.

Attributes.Name: resource_type
Attributes.Description: ACL resource type.  `TOPIC` by default. Currently, only `TOPIC` is available, and other fields will be used for future ACLs compatible with open-source Kafka.

Attributes.Name: resource_type_name
Attributes.Description: ACL resource name, which is related to `resource_type`. For example, if `resource_type` is `TOPIC`, this field indicates the topic name;
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 资源类型名称，和resourceType相关，如当resourceType为TOPIC时，则该字段表示topic名称

Attributes.Name: operation_type
Attributes.Description: ACL operation mode. Valid values: `READ`, `WRITE`

Attributes.Name: permission_type
Attributes.Description: ACL permission type. Valid values: `DENY`, `ALLOW`. and `ALLOW` by default. Currently, CKafka supports `ALLOW` (equivalent to allow list), and other fields will be used for future ACLs compatible with open-source Kafka.

Attributes.Name: host
Attributes.Description: IP address allowed to access. The default value is `*`, which means that any host can access.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 默认为*，表示任何host都可以访问，当前ckafka不支持host为*，但是后面开源kafka的产品化会直接支持

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a Ckafka Acl.
Items.Hcl:
### Ckafka Acl

```hcl
resource "cloud_ckafka_acl" "foo" {
  instance_id        = "ckafka-f9ife4zz"
  resource_type      = "TOPIC"
  resource_type_name = "topic-tf-test"
  operation_type     = "WRITE"
  permission_type    = "ALLOW"
  host               = "*"
  principal          = cloud_ckafka_user.foo.account_name
}
```

Attributes.Name: unclean_leader_election_enable
Attributes.Description: Whether to allow unsynchronized replicas to be selected as leader, default is `false`, `true: `allowed, `false`: not allowed.

Attributes.Name: topic_name
Attributes.Description: Name of the CKafka topic. It must start with a letter, the rest can contain letters, numbers and dashes(-).

Attributes.Name: ip_white_list
Attributes.Description: IP allowlist used for specifying a quota. You are required to specify this parameter when EnableWhiteList is set to true.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: Ip白名单列表，配额限制,enable_white_list=true时必选

Attributes.Name: clean_up_policy
Attributes.Description: Policy or mode to clear logs. Default value: delete. delete": logs are deleted based on the corresponding retention period. "compact": logs are compressed based on the corresponding keys. "compact, delete": logs are compressed based on the corresponding keys and deleted based on the corresponding retention period.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 清理日志策略，日志清理模式，默认为"delete"。"delete"：日志按保存时间删除，"compact"：日志按 key 压缩，"compact, delete"：日志按 key 压缩且会按保存时间删除。

Attributes.Name: instance_id
Attributes.Description: Ckafka instance ID.

Attributes.Name: enable_white_list
Attributes.Description: Whether to open the ip whitelist, `true`: open, `false`: close.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 是否开启ip鉴权白名单，true表示开启，false表示不开启

Attributes.Name: retention
Attributes.Description: Message retention period. Unit: ms. Minimum value: 60000.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 可选参数。消息保留时间，单位ms，当前最小值为60000ms

Attributes.Name: sync_replica_min_num
Attributes.Description: Min number of sync replicas, Default is `1`.

Attributes.Name: segment
Attributes.Description: Period after which a segment is rolled. Unit: ms. Minimum value: 3600000.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: Segment分片滚动的时长，单位ms，当前最小为3600000ms

Attributes.Name: max_message_bytes
Attributes.Description: Maximum size of messages in a topic. Unit: Byte. Maximum value: 12582912. The maximum value is equal to 12 MB.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 主题消息最大值，单位为 Byte，最小值1024Byte(即1KB)，最大值为12582912Byte（即12MB）

Attributes.Name: partition_num
Attributes.Description: The number of partition.

Attributes.Name: replica_num
Attributes.Description: Number of replicas. The value cannot exceed the number of brokers. Maximum value: 3.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 副本个数，不能多于 broker 数，最大为3

Attributes.Name: note
Attributes.Description: The subject note. It must start with a letter, and the remaining part can contain letters, numbers and dashes (-).

ExportAttributes.Name: segment_bytes

ExportAttributes.DescriptionCN: Segment 分片滚动的字节数

ExportAttributes.Name: forward_cos_bucket

ExportAttributes.DescriptionCN: 数据备份cos bucket: 转存到cos 的bucket地址

ExportAttributes.Name: forward_interval
ExportAttributes.Description: Periodic frequency of data backup to cos.
ExportAttributes.DescriptionCN: 数据备份到cos的周期频率

ExportAttributes.Name: forward_status

ExportAttributes.DescriptionCN: 数据备份cos 状态： 1 不开启数据备份，0 开启数据备份

ExportAttributes.Name: max_message_bytes
ExportAttributes.Description: Maximum size of messages in a topic. Unit: Byte. Maximum value: 12582912. The maximum value is equal to 12 MB.
ExportAttributes.DescriptionCN: 主题消息最大值，单位为 Byte，最小值1024Byte(即1KB)，最大值为12582912Byte（即12MB）

Items.Description: Use this resource to create ckafka topic.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_ckafka_topic" "foo" {
  instance_id                    = "ckafka-f9ife4zz"
  topic_name                     = "example"
  note                           = "topic note"
  replica_num                    = 2
  partition_num                  = 1
  enable_white_list              = true
  ip_white_list                  = ["ip1", "ip2"]
  clean_up_policy                = "delete"
  sync_replica_min_num           = 1
  unclean_leader_election_enable = false
  segment                        = 3600000
  retention                      = 60000
  max_message_bytes              = 0
}
```

Items.Description: Provide a resource to create a CLB customized config.

Attributes.Name: project_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the project within the CLB instance, `0` - Default Project.

Attributes.Name: vpc_id
Attributes.Description: VPC ID of the CLB.

Attributes.Name: subnet_id
Attributes.Description: Subnet ID of the CLB. Effective only for CLB within the VPC.

Attributes.Name: target_region_info_vpc_id
Attributes.Description: VPC ID of the target region for cross-region CLB.

Attributes.Name: address_ip_version
Attributes.Description: IP version, only applicable to open CLB. Valid values are `IPV4`, `IPV6` and `IPv6FullChain`, Default is IPV4.

Attributes.Name: security_groups
Attributes.Description: Security groups of the CLB instance. Supports both `OPEN` and `INTERNAL` CLBs.

Attributes.Name: tags
Attributes.Description: The available tags within this CLB.

Attributes.Name: slave_zone_id
Attributes.Description: Setting slave zone id of cross available zone disaster recovery. this zone will undertake traffic when the master is down.

Attributes.Name: log_topic_id
Attributes.Description: The id of log topic.

Attributes.Name: target_region_info_region
Attributes.Description: Region of the target region for cross-region CLB.

Attributes.Name: internet_bandwidth_max_out
Attributes.Description: Max bandwidth out, only applicable to open CLB. Valid value ranges is [1, 2000]. Unit is Mbps.

Attributes.Name: master_zone_id
Attributes.Description: Setting master zone id of cross available zone disaster recovery.

Attributes.Name: zone_id
Attributes.Description: Available zone id, only applicable to open CLB.

Attributes.Name: log_set_id
Attributes.Description: The id of log set.

Attributes.Name: network_type
Attributes.Description: Type of CLB instance. Valid values: `OPEN` and `INTERNAL`.

Attributes.Name: clb_name
Attributes.Description: Name of the CLB. The name can only contain Chinese characters, English letters, numbers, underscore and hyphen '-'.

Attributes.Name: internet_charge_type
Attributes.Description: Internet charge type, only applicable to open CLB. Valid values are only `TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR`.

ExportAttributes.Name: clb_vips
ExportAttributes.Description: The virtual service address table of the CLB.

ExportAttributes.Name: vpc_id
ExportAttributes.Description: VPC ID of the CLB.

ExportAttributes.Name: target_region_info_vpc_id
ExportAttributes.Description: VPC ID of the target region for cross-region CLB.

ExportAttributes.Name: address_ip_version
ExportAttributes.Description: IP version, only applicable to open CLB. Valid values are `IPV4`, `IPV6` and `IPv6FullChain`, Default is IPV4.

ExportAttributes.Name: target_region_info_region
ExportAttributes.Description: Region of the target region for cross-region CLB.

ExportAttributes.Name: internet_bandwidth_max_out
ExportAttributes.Description: Max bandwidth out, only applicable to open CLB. Valid value ranges is [1, 2000]. Unit is Mbps.

ExportAttributes.Name: instance_id
ExportAttributes.Description: CLB instance ID.

ExportAttributes.Name: internet_charge_type
ExportAttributes.Description: Internet charge type, only applicable to open CLB. Valid values are only `TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR`.

ExportAttributes.Name: vip_isp
ExportAttributes.Description: Network operator, only applicable to open CLB. Valid values are `CMCC`(China Mobile), `CTCC`(Telecom), `CUCC`(China Unicom) and `BGP`. If this ISP is specified, network billing method can only use the bandwidth package billing (BANDWIDTH_PACKAGE).

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a CLB instance.

Attributes.Name: health_check_interval_time
Attributes.Description: Interval time of health check. Valid value ranges: [2~300] sec. and the default is 5 sec. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_health_num
Attributes.Description: Health threshold of health check, and the default is `3`. If a success result is returned for the health check for 3 consecutive times, the backend CVM is identified as healthy. The value range is 2-10. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in cloud_clb_listener_rule.

Attributes.Name: health_check_port
Attributes.Description: The health check port is the port of the backend service by default. Unless you want to specify a specific port, it is recommended to leave it blank. Only applicable to TCP/UDP listener.

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_method
Attributes.Description: HTTP health check method of TCP listener. Valid values: `HEAD`, `GET`.

Attributes.Name: sni_switch
Attributes.Description: Indicates whether SNI is enabled, and only supported with protocol `HTTPS`. If enabled, you can set a certificate for each rule in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`, otherwise all rules have a certificate.

Attributes.Name: health_check_switch
Attributes.Description: Indicates whether health check is enabled.

Attributes.Name: health_check_time_out
Attributes.Description: Response timeout of health check. Valid value ranges: [2~60] sec. Default is 2 sec. Response timeout needs to be less than check interval. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `TCP`,`UDP` protocol.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 健康检查响应超时时间

Attributes.Name: health_check_context_type
Attributes.Description: Health check protocol. When the value of `health_check_type` of the health check protocol is `CUSTOM`, this field is required, which represents the input format of the health check. Valid values: `HEX`, `TEXT`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_recv_context
Attributes.Description: It represents the result returned by the health check. When the value of `health_check_type` of the health check protocol is `CUSTOM`, this field is required. Only ASCII visible characters are allowed and the maximum length is 500. When `health_check_context_type` value is `HEX`, the characters of SendContext and RecvContext can only be selected in `0123456789ABCDEF` and the length must be even digits.

Attributes.Name: session_expire_time
Attributes.Description: Time of session persistence within the CLB listener. NOTES: Available when scheduler is specified as `WRR`. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: port
Attributes.Description: Port of the CLB listener.

Attributes.Name: protocol
Attributes.Description: Type of protocol within the listener. Valid values: `TCP`, `UDP`, `HTTP`, `HTTPS`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_type
Attributes.Description: Protocol used for health check. Valid values: `CUSTOM`, `TCP`, `HTTP`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_version
Attributes.Description: The HTTP version of the backend service. When the value of `health_check_type` of the health check protocol is `HTTP`, this field is required. Valid values: `HTTP/1.0`, `HTTP/1.1`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_code
Attributes.Description: HTTP health check code of TCP listener, Valid value ranges: [1~31]. When the value of `health_check_type` of the health check protocol is `HTTP`, this field is required. Valid values: `1`, `2`, `4`, `8`, `16`. `1` means http_1xx, `2` means http_2xx, `4` means http_3xx, `8` means http_4xx, `16` means http_5xx.If you want multiple return codes to indicate health, need to add the corresponding values.

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_path
Attributes.Description: HTTP health check path of TCP listener.

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_domain
Attributes.Description: HTTP health check domain of TCP listener.

Attributes.Name: health_check_send_context
Attributes.Description: It represents the content of the request sent by the health check. When the value of `health_check_type` of the health check protocol is `CUSTOM`, this field is required. Only visible ASCII characters are allowed and the maximum length is 500. When `health_check_context_type` value is `HEX`, the characters of SendContext and RecvContext can only be selected in `0123456789ABCDEF` and the length must be even digits.

Attributes.Name: clb_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the CLB.

Attributes.Name: listener_name
Attributes.Description: Name of the CLB listener, and available values can only be Chinese characters, English letters, numbers, underscore and hyphen '-'.

Attributes.Name: health_check_unhealth_num
Attributes.Description: Unhealthy threshold of health check, and the default is `3`. If a success result is returned for the health check 3 consecutive times, the CVM is identified as unhealthy. The value range is [2-10]. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: certificate_ssl_mode
Attributes.Description: Type of certificate. Valid values: `UNIDIRECTIONAL`, `MUTUAL`. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTPS` protocol and must be set when it is available.

Attributes.Name: certificate_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the server certificate. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTPS` protocol and must be set when it is available.

Attributes.Name: certificate_ca_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the client certificate. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTPS` protocol and must be set when the ssl mode is `MUTUAL`.

Attributes.Name: scheduler
Attributes.Description: Scheduling method of the CLB listener, and available values are 'WRR' and 'LEAST_CONN'. The default is 'WRR'. NOTES: The listener of `HTTP` and `HTTPS` protocol additionally supports the `IP Hash` method. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: target_type
Attributes.Description: Backend target type. Valid values: `NODE`, `TARGETGROUP`. `NODE` means to bind ordinary nodes, `TARGETGROUP` means to bind target group.

ExportAttributes.Name: health_check_interval_time
ExportAttributes.Description: Interval time of health check. Valid value ranges: [2~300] sec. and the default is 5 sec. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

ExportAttributes.Name: health_check_health_num
ExportAttributes.Description: Health threshold of health check, and the default is `3`. If a success result is returned for the health check for 3 consecutive times, the backend CVM is identified as healthy. The value range is 2-10. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in cloud_clb_listener_rule.

ExportAttributes.Name: health_check_http_method
ExportAttributes.Description: HTTP health check method of TCP listener. Valid values: `HEAD`, `GET`.

ExportAttributes.Name: health_check_switch
ExportAttributes.Description: Indicates whether health check is enabled.

ExportAttributes.Name: health_check_time_out
ExportAttributes.Description: Response timeout of health check. Valid value ranges: [2~60] sec. Default is 2 sec. Response timeout needs to be less than check interval. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `TCP`,`UDP` protocol.
ExportAttributes.DescriptionCN: 健康检查响应超时时间

ExportAttributes.Name: listener_id
ExportAttributes.Description: ID of this CLB listener.

ExportAttributes.Name: health_check_type
ExportAttributes.Description: Protocol used for health check. Valid values: `CUSTOM`, `TCP`, `HTTP`.

ExportAttributes.Name: health_check_unhealth_num
ExportAttributes.Description: Unhealthy threshold of health check, and the default is `3`. If a success result is returned for the health check 3 consecutive times, the CVM is identified as unhealthy. The value range is [2-10]. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

ExportAttributes.Name: target_type
ExportAttributes.Description: Backend target type. Valid values: `NODE`, `TARGETGROUP`. `NODE` means to bind ordinary nodes, `TARGETGROUP` means to bind target group.

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a CLB listener.
Items.Hcl:
### HTTP Listener

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_listener" "HTTP_listener" {
  clb_id        = "lb-0lh5au7v"
  listener_name = "test_listener"
  port          = 80
  protocol      = "HTTP"
}
```

### TCP/UDP Listener

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_listener" "TCP_listener" {
  clb_id                     = "lb-0lh5au7v"
  listener_name              = "test_listener"
  port                       = 80
  protocol                   = "TCP"
  health_check_switch        = true
  health_check_time_out      = 2
  health_check_interval_time = 5
  health_check_health_num    = 3
  health_check_unhealth_num  = 3
  session_expire_time        = 30
  scheduler                  = "WRR"
  health_check_port          = 200
  health_check_type          = "HTTP"
  health_check_http_code     = 2
  health_check_http_version  = "HTTP/1.0"
  health_check_http_method   = "GET"
}
```

### TCP/UDP Listener with tcp health check

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_listener" "listener_tcp" {
  clb_id                     = cloud_clb_instance.clb_basic.id
  listener_name              = "listener_tcp"
  port                       = 44
  protocol                   = "TCP"
  health_check_switch        = true
  health_check_time_out      = 30
  health_check_interval_time = 100
  health_check_health_num    = 2
  health_check_unhealth_num  = 2
  session_expire_time        = 30
  scheduler                  = "WRR"
  health_check_type          = "TCP"
  health_check_port          = 200
}
```

### TCP/UDP Listener with http health check

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_listener" "listener_tcp" {
  clb_id                     = cloud_clb_instance.clb_basic.id
  listener_name              = "listener_tcp"
  port                       = 44
  protocol                   = "TCP"
  health_check_switch        = true
  health_check_time_out      = 30
  health_check_interval_time = 100
  health_check_health_num    = 2
  health_check_unhealth_num  = 2
  session_expire_time        = 30
  scheduler                  = "WRR"
  health_check_type          = "HTTP"
  health_check_http_domain   = "www.tencent.com"
  health_check_http_code     = 16
  health_check_http_version  = "HTTP/1.1"
  health_check_http_method   = "HEAD"
  health_check_http_path     = "/"
}
```

### TCP/UDP Listener with customer health check

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_listener" "listener_tcp" {
  clb_id                     = cloud_clb_instance.clb_basic.id
  listener_name              = "listener_tcp"
  port                       = 44
  protocol                   = "TCP"
  health_check_switch        = true
  health_check_time_out      = 30
  health_check_interval_time = 100
  health_check_health_num    = 2
  health_check_unhealth_num  = 2
  session_expire_time        = 30
  scheduler                  = "WRR"
  health_check_type          = "CUSTOM"
  health_check_context_type  = "HEX"
  health_check_send_context  = "0123456789ABCDEF"
  health_check_recv_context  = "ABCD"
  target_type                = "TARGETGROUP"
}
```

### HTTPS Listener

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_listener" "HTTPS_listener" {
  clb_id               = "lb-0lh5au7v"
  listener_name        = "test_listener"
  port                 = "80"
  protocol             = "HTTPS"
  certificate_ssl_mode = "MUTUAL"
  certificate_id       = "VjANRdz8"
  certificate_ca_id    = "VfqO4zkB"
  sni_switch           = true
}
```

### TCP SSL Listener

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_listener" "TCPSSL_listener" {
  clb_id                     = "lb-0lh5au7v"
  listener_name              = "test_listener"
  port                       = "80"
  protocol                   = "TCP_SSL"
  certificate_ssl_mode       = "MUTUAL"
  certificate_id             = "VjANRdz8"
  certificate_ca_id          = "VfqO4zkB"
  health_check_switch        = true
  health_check_time_out      = 2
  health_check_interval_time = 5
  health_check_health_num    = 3
  health_check_unhealth_num  = 3
  scheduler                  = "WRR"
  target_type                = "TARGETGROUP"
}
```

Attributes.Name: health_check_unhealth_num
Attributes.Description: Unhealthy threshold of health check, and the default is `3`. If the unhealthy result is returned 3 consecutive times, indicates that the forwarding is abnormal. The value range is [2-10].  NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_time_out
Attributes.Description: Time out of health check. The value range is [2-60](SEC).

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_code
Attributes.Description: HTTP Status Code. The default is 31. Valid value ranges: [1~31]. `1 means the return value '1xx' is health. `2` means the return value '2xx' is health. `4` means the return value '3xx' is health. `8` means the return value '4xx' is health. 16 means the return value '5xx' is health. If you want multiple return codes to indicate health, need to add the corresponding values. NOTES: The 'HTTP' health check of the 'TCP' listener only supports specifying one health check status code. NOTES: Only supports listeners of 'HTTP' and 'HTTPS' protocol.

Attributes.Name: certificate_ca_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the client certificate. NOTES: Only supports listeners of HTTPS protocol.

Attributes.Name: session_expire_time
Attributes.Description: Time of session persistence within the CLB listener. NOTES: Available when scheduler is specified as `WRR`.  NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: scheduler
Attributes.Description: Scheduling method of the CLB listener rules. Valid values: `WRR`, `IP_HASH`, `LEAST_CONN`. The default is `WRR`.  NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: target_type
Attributes.Description: Backend target type. Valid values: `NODE`, `TARGETGROUP`. `NODE` means to bind ordinary nodes, `TARGETGROUP` means to bind target group.

Attributes.Name: listener_id
Attributes.Description: ID of CLB listener.

Attributes.Name: url
Attributes.Description: Url of the listener rule.

Attributes.Name: health_check_interval_time
Attributes.Description: Interval time of health check. Valid value ranges: (2~300) sec. and the default is `5` sec. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_domain
Attributes.Description: Domain name of health check. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTP` and `HTTPS` protocol.

Attributes.Name: forward_type
Attributes.Description: Forwarding protocol between the CLB instance and real server. Valid values: `HTTP`, `HTTPS`.

Attributes.Name: clb_id
Attributes.Description: ID of CLB instance.

Attributes.Name: health_check_health_num
Attributes.Description: Health threshold of health check, and the default is `3`. If a success result is returned for the health check 3 consecutive times, indicates that the forwarding is normal. The value range is [2-10]. NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_path
Attributes.Description: Path of health check. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTP` and `HTTPS` protocol.

Attributes.Name: certificate_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the server certificate. NOTES: Only supports listeners of HTTPS protocol.

Attributes.Name: domain
Attributes.Description: Domain name of the listener rule.

Attributes.Name: health_check_switch
Attributes.Description: Indicates whether health check is enabled.

Attributes.Name: health_check_type
Attributes.Description: Type of health check. Valid value is `CUSTOM`, `TCP`, `HTTP`.

Attributes.Name: health_check_http_method
Attributes.Description: Methods of health check. NOTES: Only supports listeners of `HTTP` and `HTTPS` protocol. The default is `HEAD`, the available value are `HEAD` and `GET`.

Attributes.Name: certificate_ssl_mode
Attributes.Description: Type of certificate. Valid values: `UNIDIRECTIONAL`, `MUTUAL`. NOTES: Only supports listeners of HTTPS protocol.

Attributes.Name: http2_switch
Attributes.Description: Indicate to apply HTTP2.0 protocol or not.

ExportAttributes.Description: Unhealthy threshold of health check, and the default is `3`. If the unhealthy result is returned 3 consecutive times, indicates that the forwarding is abnormal. The value range is [2-10].  NOTES: TCP/UDP listener allows direct configuration, HTTP/HTTPS listener needs to be configured in `cloud_clb_listener_rule`.

Items.Description: Provide a resource to create a CLB listener rule.
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_listener_rule" "foo" {
  listener_id                = "lbl-hh141sn9"
  clb_id                     = "lb-k2zjp9lv"
  domain                     = "foo.net"
  url                        = "/bar"
  health_check_switch        = true
  health_check_interval_time = 5
  health_check_health_num    = 3
  health_check_unhealth_num  = 3
  health_check_http_code     = 2
  health_check_http_path     = "Default Path"
  health_check_http_domain   = "Default Domain"
  health_check_http_method   = "GET"
  certificate_ssl_mode       = "MUTUAL"
  certificate_id             = "VjANRdz8"
  certificate_ca_id          = "VfqO4zkB"
  session_expire_time        = 30
  scheduler                  = "WRR"
}
```

Attributes.Name: is_auto_rewrite
Attributes.Description: Indicates whether automatic forwarding is enable, default is `false`. If enabled, the source listener and location will not be used, the target listener and location must be https protocol and port is 443.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 是否自动重写，若启用自动重写，target_listener_id和target_rule_id必须符合https协议443端口，并且source_listener_id和source_rule_id无效，自动设置源监听器为http:80

Attributes.Name: delete_all_auto_rewrite
Attributes.Description: Indicates whether delete all auto redirection. Default is `false`. It will take effect only when this redirection is auto-rewrite and this auto-rewrite auto redirected more than one rules. All the auto-rewrite relations will be deleted when this parameter set true.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 是否删除所有自动重写

Attributes.Name: clb_id
Attributes.Description: ID of CLB instance.

Attributes.Name: source_listener_id
Attributes.Description: ID of source listener.

Attributes.Name: target_listener_id
Attributes.Description: ID of target listener.

Attributes.Name: source_rule_id
Attributes.Description: Rule ID of source listener.

Attributes.Name: target_rule_id
Attributes.Description: Rule ID of target listener.

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create a CLB redirection.
Items.Hcl:
### Manual Rewrite

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_redirection" "foo" {
  clb_id             = "lb-p7olt9e5"
  source_listener_id = "lbl-jc1dx6ju"
  target_listener_id = "lbl-asj1hzuo"
  source_rule_id     = "loc-ft8fmngv"
  target_rule_id     = "loc-4xxr2cy7"
}
```

### Auto Rewrite

```hcl
resource "cloud_clb_redirection" "foo" {
  clb_id             = "lb-p7olt9e5"
  target_listener_id = "lbl-asj1hzuo"
  target_rule_id     = "loc-4xxr2cy7"
  is_auto_rewrite    = true
}
```

Attributes.Name: new_alias
Attributes.Description: Name of the SSL certificate.

Attributes.Name: new_cert
Attributes.Description: Content of the SSL certificate. Not allowed newline at the start and end.

Attributes.Name: new_cert_key
Attributes.Description: Key of the SSL certificate and required when certificate type is `SVR`. Not allowed newline at the start and end.

Attributes.Name: old_cert_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the certificate to be replaced, which can be a server certificate or a client certificate.

Attributes.Name: load_balancer_ids
Attributes.Description: Array of CLB instance IDs. Only support set one security group now.

Attributes.Name: security_group
Attributes.Description: Security group ID, such as esg-12345678.

Items.Description: Provide a resource to create a clb security_group_attachment

Attributes.Name: topic_id
Attributes.Description: ID of the log topic bound to the delivery task.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 投递任务绑定的日志主题 ID

Attributes.Name: need_content
Attributes.Description: Whether to deliver log metadata information. Default is true. When NeedContent is true, the Content field is valid. When NeedContent is false, the Content field is invalid.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 是否投递日志的元数据信息，默认为 true。 当NeedContent为true时：字段Content有效。 当NeedContent为false时：字段Content无效。

Attributes.Name: compression
Attributes.Description: Compression method for delivery. Values: 0 (NONE), 2 (SNAPPY), 3 (LZ4).

BlockTypes.Name: content
BlockTypes.Description: Description of metadata information if metadata needs to be delivered.

PossibleValues.Name: timestamp_accuracy
PossibleValues.Description: Delivery timestamp precision. Options: [1: second; 2: millisecond]. Default is 1.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 投递时间戳精度，可选项 [1：秒；2：毫秒] ，默认是1。

PossibleValues.Name: json_type
PossibleValues.Description: Delivery JSON format. JsonType 0: consistent with original log, no escaping. JsonType 1: escaped.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 投递Json格式。 JsonType为0：和原始日志一致，不转义。示例： 日志原文：{"a":"aa", "b":{"b1":"b1b1", "c1":"c1c1"}} 投递到Ckafka：{"a":"aa", "b":{"b1":"b1b1", "c1":"c1c1"}}  JsonType为1：转义。示例： 日志原文：{"a":"aa", "b":{"b1":"b1b1", "c1":"c1c1"}} 投递到Ckafka：{"a":"aa","b":"{\"b1\":\"b1b1\", \"c1\":\"c1c1\"}"}

PossibleValues.Name: enable_tag
PossibleValues.Description: Whether to deliver TAG information. When EnableTag is true, it means delivering TAG metadata information.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 是否投递 TAG 信息。 当EnableTag为true时，表示投递TAG元信息。

PossibleValues.Name: meta_fields
PossibleValues.Description: List of metadata to be delivered. Currently only supports: __SOURCE__, __FILENAME__, __TIMESTAMP__, __HOSTNAME__ and __PKGID__.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 需要投递的元数据列表，目前仅支持：__SOURCE__，__FILENAME__，__TIMESTAMP__，__HOSTNAME__和__PKGID__

PossibleValues.Name: tag_json_not_tiled
PossibleValues.Description: When EnableTag is true, this field must be filled. TagJsonNotTiled is used to identify whether tag information is JSON flattened. When TagJsonNotTiled is true, it is not flattened. When TagJsonNotTiled is false, it is flattened.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 当EnableTag为true时，必须填写TagJsonNotTiled字段。 TagJsonNotTiled用于标识tag信息是否json平铺。  TagJsonNotTiled为true时不平铺，示例： TAG信息：{"__TAG__":{"fieldA":200,"fieldB":"text"}} 不平铺：{"__TAG__":{"fieldA":200,"fieldB":"text"}}  TagJsonNotTiled为false时平铺，示例： TAG信息：{"__TAG__":{"fieldA":200,"fieldB":"text"}} 平铺：{"__TAG__.fieldA":200,"__TAG__.fieldB":"text"}

BlockTypes.DescriptionCN: 如果需要投递元数据信息，元数据信息的描述

BlockTypes.Name: ckafka
BlockTypes.Description: CKafka description.

PossibleValues.Name: vip
PossibleValues.Description: CKafka VIP address.

PossibleValues.Name: vport
PossibleValues.Description: CKafka VPort.

PossibleValues.Name: instance_id
PossibleValues.Description: CKafka instance ID.

PossibleValues.Name: instance_name
PossibleValues.Description: CKafka instance name.

PossibleValues.Name: topic_id
PossibleValues.Description: CKafka topic ID.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 投递任务绑定的日志主题 ID

PossibleValues.Name: topic_name
PossibleValues.Description: CKafka topic name.

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create and manage CLS CKafka consumer
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_cls_ckafka_consumer" "ckafka_consumer" {
  compression  = 1
  need_content = true
  topic_id     = "7e34a3a7-635e-4da8-9005-88106c1fde69"

  ckafka {
    instance_id   = "ckafka-qzoeaqx8"
    instance_name = "ckafka-instance"
    topic_id      = "topic-c6tm4kpm"
    topic_name    = "name"
    vip           = "203.0.113.23"
    vport         = "9092"
  }

  content {
    enable_tag = true
    meta_fields = [
      "__FILENAME__",
      "__HOSTNAME__",
      "__PKGID__",
      "__SOURCE__",
      "__TIMESTAMP__",
    ]
    tag_json_not_tiled = true
    timestamp_accuracy = 2
  }
}
```

Attributes.Name: user_define_rule
Attributes.Description: User-defined collection rule, JSON format serialized string. Required when LogType is user_define_log.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 用户自定义采集规则，Json格式序列化的字符串。当LogType为user_define_log时，必填。

Attributes.Name: log_format
Attributes.Description: Log formatting method.

Attributes.Name: config_extra_id
Attributes.Description: config_extra table primary key ID.

Attributes.Name: advanced_config
Attributes.Description: Advanced collection configuration. JSON string, Key/Value definitions: ClsAgentFileTimeout (timeout attribute), value range: integer >= 0, 0 means no timeout; ClsAgentMaxDepth (maximum directory depth), value range: integer >= 0; ClsAgentParseFailMerge (merge parse failed logs), value range: true or false. Example: {"ClsAgentFileTimeout":0,"ClsAgentMaxDepth":10,"ClsAgentParseFailMerge":true}. Console default placeholder: {"ClsAgentDefault":0}.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 高级采集配置。 Json字符串， Key/Value定义为如下：  ClsAgentFileTimeout(超时属性), 取值范围: 大于等于0的整数， 0为不超时 ClsAgentMaxDepth(最大目录深度)，取值范围: 大于等于0的整数 ClsAgentParseFailMerge(合并解析失败日志)，取值范围: true或false 样例： {\"ClsAgentFileTimeout\":0,\"ClsAgentMaxDepth\":10,\"ClsAgentParseFailMerge\":true} 控制台默认占位值：{\"ClsAgentDefault\":0}

Attributes.Name: source
Attributes.Description: Collection configuration source. 0: default source, 1: TKE.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 采集配置来源，0：默认来源，1: TKE

Attributes.Name: config_flag
Attributes.Description: Collection configuration tag.

Attributes.Name: name
Attributes.Description: Collection configuration name.

Attributes.Name: output
Attributes.Description: Log topic ID (TopicId) of collection configuration.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 采集配置所属日志主题ID即TopicId

Attributes.Name: path
Attributes.Description: Log collection path, including filename. Supports multiple paths separated by English commas. Required for file collection.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 日志采集路径，包含文件名，支持多个路径，多个路径之间英文逗号分隔，文件采集情况下必填

Attributes.Name: log_type
Attributes.Description: Type of the log to be collected. Default value: minimalist_log. Supported types: json_log: JSON file log; delimiter_log: delimiter file log; minimalist_log: single-line full text file log; fullregex_log: single-line full regex file log; multiline_log: multi-line full text file log; multiline_fullregex_log: multi-line full regex file log; user_define_log: composite parsing (for multi-format nested logs); service_syslog: syslog collection; windows_event_log: Windows event log.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 采集的日志类型，默认为minimalist_log。支持以下类型：  json_log代表：JSON-文件日志（详见使用 JSON 提取模式采集日志）； delimiter_log代表：分隔符-文件日志（详见使用分隔符提取模式采集日志）； minimalist_log代表：单行全文-文件日志（详见使用单行全文提取模式采集日志）； fullregex_log代表：单行完全正则-文件日志（详见使用单行-完全正则提取模式采集日志）； multiline_log代表：多行全文-文件日志（详见使用多行全文提取模式采集日志）； multiline_fullregex_log代表：多行完全正则-文件日志（详见使用多行-完全正则提取模式采集日志）； user_define_log代表：组合解析（适用于多格式嵌套的日志，详见使用组合解析提取模式采集日志）； service_syslog代表：syslog 采集（详见采集 Syslog）； windows_event_log代表：Windows事件日志（详见采集 Windows 事件日志）。

BlockTypes.Name: exclude_paths
BlockTypes.Description: Collection blacklist path list.

PossibleValues.Name: type
PossibleValues.Description: Type. Valid values: File, Path.

PossibleValues.Name: value
PossibleValues.Description: Specific content corresponding to Type.

BlockTypes.Name: extract_rule
BlockTypes.Description: Extraction rule. If ExtractRule is set, LogType must be set.

PossibleValues.Name: is_gbk
PossibleValues.Description: GBK encoding. Default 0.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 是否为Gbk编码。 0：否；1：是。 注意  目前取0值时，表示UTF-8编码 COS导入不支持此字段。

PossibleValues.Name: protocol
PossibleValues.Description: Syslog protocol, tcp or udp.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: syslog传输协议，取值为tcp或者udp，只有在LogType为service_syslog时生效，其余类型无需填写。 注意：  该字段适用于：创建采集规则配置、修改采集规则配置。 COS导入不支持此字段。

PossibleValues.Name: parse_protocol
PossibleValues.Description: Parse protocol.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: rfc3164：指定系统日志采集使用RFC3164协议解析日志。 rfc5424：指定系统日志采集使用RFC5424协议解析日志。 auto：自动匹配rfc3164或者rfc5424其中一种协议。 只有在LogType为service_syslog时生效，其余类型无需填写。 注意：  该字段适用于：创建采集规则配置、修改采集规则配置 COS导入不支持此字段。

PossibleValues.Name: time_key
PossibleValues.Description: Time field key name. time_key and time_format must appear in pair.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 时间字段的key名字，TimeKey和TimeFormat必须成对出现

PossibleValues.Name: time_format
PossibleValues.Description: Time field format. For more information, please see the output parameters of the time format description of the strftime function in C language.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 时间字段的格式，参考c语言的strftime函数对于时间的格式说明输出参数

PossibleValues.Name: begin_regex
PossibleValues.Description: First-Line matching rule, which is valid only if log_type is multiline_log or fullregex_log.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 首行匹配规则，仅当log_type为multiline_log或fullregex_log时有效

PossibleValues.Name: address
PossibleValues.Description: Syslog system log collection specifies the address and port that the collector listens to.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: syslog系统日志采集指定采集器监听的地址和端口 ，形式：[ip]:[port]，只有在LogType为service_syslog时生效，其余类型无需填写。 注意：  该字段适用于：创建采集规则配置、修改采集规则配置。 COS导入不支持此字段。

PossibleValues.Name: meta_tags
PossibleValues.Description: List of metadata tags for the machine group.

PossibleValues.Name: key
PossibleValues.Description: Key of the metadata tag for the machine group.

PossibleValues.Name: value
PossibleValues.Description: Value of the metadata tag for the machine group.

PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 机器组元数据信息列表

PossibleValues.Name: event_log_rules
PossibleValues.Description: Windows event log collection rules. Only effective when LogType is windows_event_log, no need to fill for other types.

PossibleValues.Name: event_ids
PossibleValues.Description: Event ID filter list. Optional, empty means no filtering. Supports positive filtering for single values (e.g.: 20) or ranges (e.g.: 0-20), also supports negative filtering for single values (e.g.: -20). Multiple filter items can be separated by commas. For example: 1-200,-100 means collecting event logs in the range 1-200 excluding 100.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 事件ID过滤列表  选填，为空表示不做过滤 支持正向过滤单个值（例：20）或范围（例：0-20），也支持反向过滤单个值(例：-20) 多个过滤项之间可由逗号隔开，例：1-200,-100表示采集1-200范围内除了100以外的事件日志

PossibleValues.Name: event_channel
PossibleValues.Description: Event channel. Supported values: Application, Security, Setup, System, ALL.

PossibleValues.Name: time_type
PossibleValues.Description: Time type. 1: user-defined, 2: current time.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 时间类型，1:用户自定义，2:当前时间

PossibleValues.Name: time_stamp
PossibleValues.Description: Time. When the user selects the custom time type, a specific time needs to be specified.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 时间，用户选择自定义时间类型时，需要指定时间

PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 分隔符日志的分隔符，仅当log_type为delimiter_log时有效

PossibleValues.Description: Full log matching rule, which is valid only if log_type is fullregex_log.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 完整日志匹配规则，仅当log_type为fullregex_log时有效

PossibleValues.Description: Log keys to be filtered and the corresponding regex.

PossibleValues.Description: Log key to be filtered.

PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 需要过滤日志的key及其对应的regex

PossibleValues.Name: un_match_up_load_switch
PossibleValues.Description: Whether to upload the logs that failed to be parsed. Valid values: true: yes; false: no.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 解析失败日志是否上传，true表示上传，false表示不上传

PossibleValues.Name: json_standard
PossibleValues.Description: Standard json. Default 0.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 是否为标准json。 0：否； 1：是。  标准json指采集器使用业界标准开源解析器进行json解析，非标json指采集器使用CLS自研json解析器进行解析，两种解析器没有本质区别，建议客户使用标准json进行解析。

PossibleValues.Name: metadata_type
PossibleValues.Description: Metadata type.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 元数据类型。0: 不使用元数据信息；1:使用机器组元数据；2:使用用户自定义元数据；3:使用采集配置路径。 注意：  COS导入不支持此字段。

PossibleValues.Name: path_regex
PossibleValues.Description: Metadata path regex.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 采集配置路径正则表达式。  请用"()"标识路径中目标字段对应的正则表达式，解析时将"()"视为捕获组，并以__TAG__.{i}:{目标字段}的形式与日志一起上报，其中i为捕获组的序号。 若不希望以序号为键名，可以通过命名捕获组"(?<{键名}>{正则})"自定义键名，并以__TAG__.{键名}:{目标字段}的形式与日志一起上报。最多支持5个捕获组 注意：  MetadataType为3时必填。 COS导入不支持此字段。

PossibleValues.Name: keys
PossibleValues.Description: Key name of each extracted field. An empty key indicates to discard the field. This parameter is valid only if log_type is delimiter_log. json_log logs use the key of JSON itself.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 每个提取字段的key名字，如果key为空，则表示丢弃该字段，仅当log_type为delimiter_log时有效，json_log日志使用json本身的key

PossibleValues.Name: un_match_log_key
PossibleValues.Description: Unmatched log key.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 失败日志的key，当UnMatchUpLoadSwitch为true时必填

PossibleValues.Name: backtracking
PossibleValues.Description: Size of the data to be rewound in incremental collection mode. Default value: -1 (full collection).
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 增量采集模式下的回溯数据量，默认：-1（全量采集）；其他非负数表示增量采集（从最新的位置，往前采集${Backtracking}字节（Byte）的日志）最大支持1073741824（1G）。 注意：  COS导入不支持此字段。

Items.Description: Provides a resource to create and manage CLS COS recharge task for importing log data from COS
Items.Hcl:
```hcl
resource "cloud_cls_cos_recharge" "cos_recharge" {
  bucket        = "cos-lock-1308919341"
  bucket_region = "ap-guangzhou"
  log_type      = "minimalist_log"
  logset_id     = "dd426d1a-95bc-4bca-b8c2-baa169261812"
  name          = "cos_recharge_for_test"
  prefix        = "test"
  topic_id      = "7e34a3a7-635e-4da8-9005-88106c1fde69"

  extract_rule_info {
    backtracking            = 0
    is_gbk                  = 0
    json_standard           = 0
    keys                    = []
    metadata_type           = 0
    un_match_up_load_switch = false

    filter_key_regex {
      key   = "__CONTENT__"
      regex = "dasd"
    }
  }
}
```

Attributes.Name: interval
Attributes.Description: Shipping time interval in seconds. Default value: 300. Value range: 300~900.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 投递的时间间隔，单位 秒，默认300，范围 300-900

Attributes.Description: Cross-account UIN for supporting cross-account bucket shipping.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 跨账户uin，用于支持跨账户bucket投递

Attributes.Name: end_time
Attributes.Description: End time point for the shipping data range, cannot be a future time. If not filled by user, defaults to continuous shipping, i.e., infinite.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 投递数据范围的结束时间点，不能填写未来时间。如果用户不填写，默认为持续投递，即无限。

Attributes.Name: max_size
Attributes.Description: Maximum size of a file to be shipped, in MB. Default value: 256. Value range: 100~256.
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 投递的文件的最大值，单位 MB，默认100，范围 5-256

Attributes.Name: filename_mode
Attributes.Description: File naming configuration for shipped logs. 0: random number naming, 1: shipping time naming. Default value: 0 (random number naming).
Attributes.DescriptionCN: 投递文件命名配置，0：随机数命名，1：投递时间命名，默认0（随机数命名）

Attributes.DescriptionCN: 投递数据范围的开始时间点，不能超出日志主题的生命周期起点。如果用户不填写，默认为用户新建投递任务的时间。

分词符，其中的每个字符代表一个分词符； 仅支持英文符号、
	及转义符\； 注意：
	本身已被转义，直接使用双引号包裹即可作为入参，无需再次转义。使用API Explorer进行调试时请使用JSON参数输入方式，以避免

全文索引配置, 为空时代表未开启全文索引

PossibleValues.Name: dynamic_index
PossibleValues.Description: Key-value index automatic configuration. Empty means this feature is not enabled. When enabled, fields in logs will be automatically added to key-value index, including new fields added later.

PossibleValues.Name: status
PossibleValues.Description: Dynamic index configuration switch.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 是否生效，默认为true。true表示索引生效，false表示索引不生效。
键值索引自动配置，为空时代表未开启该功能。 启用后自动将日志内的字段添加到键值索引中，包括日志中后续新增的字段。

PossibleValues.Name: key_value
PossibleValues.Description: Key-Value index configuration. Empty means key-value index is not enabled.

PossibleValues.Name: template_type
PossibleValues.Description: Whether index enables dynamic template. If enabled, index will be configured based on reported key-value pairs, but all field types are text, case sensitive, analysis not supported, using default delimiters. Deprecated.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 索引是否开启动态模板；若开启，则会根据上报的键值对配置索引，但是所有字段类型都是text，大小写敏感，不支持分析，采用默认分词符。已废弃

PossibleValues.Name: key_values
PossibleValues.Description: Key-Value pair information of the index to be created. Up to 100 key-value pairs can be configured.

PossibleValues.Name: key
PossibleValues.Description: Field name for key-value or metafield index configuration. Only supports letters, numbers, underscores and -./@, and cannot start with underscore. Note: 1. Metafield (tag) Key does not need __TAG__. prefix, consistent with field Key when uploading logs, console will automatically add __TAG__. prefix for display. 2. Total number of Keys in key-value index (KeyValue) and metafield index (Tag) cannot exceed 300. 3. Key hierarchy cannot exceed 10 levels, e.g. a.b.c.d.e.f.g.h.j.k. 4. Cannot contain both json parent and child fields, e.g. a and a.b.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 需要配置键值或者元字段索引的字段名称，仅支持字母、数字、下划线和-./@，且不能以下划线开头  注意： 1，元字段（tag）的Key无需额外添加__TAG__.前缀，与上传日志时对应的字段Key一致即可，云控制台展示时将自动添加__TAG__.前缀 2，键值索引（KeyValue）及元字段索引（Tag）中的Key总数不能超过300 3，Key的层级不能超过10层，例如a.b.c.d.e.f.g.h.j.k 4，不允许同时包含json父子级字段，例如a及a.b

PossibleValues.Name: value

PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 字段是否开启分析功能。true表示开启分析功能，false表示关闭分析功能。

PossibleValues.DescriptionCN:
分词符，其中的每个字符代表一个分词符； 仅支持英文符号、

键值索引配置，为空时代表未开启键值索引

PossibleValues.Name: tag
PossibleValues.Description: Metafield index configuration. Empty means metafield index is not enabled.

PossibleValues.Name: case_sensitive

PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 是否大小写敏感。true表示大小写敏感，false表示大小写不敏感。

PossibleValues.Description: Key-Value pair information of the index to be created. Up to 100 key-value pairs can be configured.

PossibleValues.Name: key
PossibleValues.Description: Field name for key-value or metafield index configuration. Only supports letters, numbers, underscores and -./@, and cannot start with underscore. Note: 1. Metafield (tag) Key does not need __TAG__. prefix, consistent with field Key when uploading logs, console will automatically add __TAG__. prefix for display. 2. Total number of Keys in key-value index (KeyValue) and metafield index (Tag) cannot exceed 300. 3. Key hierarchy cannot exceed 10 levels, e.g. a.b.c.d.e.f.g.h.j.k. 4. Cannot contain both json parent and child fields, e.g. a and a.b.
PossibleValues.DescriptionCN: 需要配置键值或者元字段索引的字段名称，仅支持字母、数字、下划线和-./@，且不能以下划线开头  注意： 1，元字段（tag）的Key无需额外添加__TAG__.前缀，与上传日志时对应的字段Key一致即可，云控制台展示时将自动添加__TAG__.前缀 2，键值索引（KeyValue）及元字段索引（Tag）中的Key总数不能超过300 3，Key的层级不能超过10层，例如a.b.c.d.e.f.g.h.j.k 4，不允许同时包含json父子级字段，例如a及a.b

分词符，其中的每个字符代表一个分词符； 仅支持英文符号、
